title: FS: Four Card T206 Lot: All SGC 30 - $100 - SOLD
author: t206hound

posts.post_title: FS: Four Card T206 Lot: All SGC 30 - $100 - SOLD
posts.post_content:
These are the left over 30s from my singles sale; let's try selling them off as a lot.  $100 delivered; standard paypal preferred.

Cards are: Bergen (Catching), Cravath, (Jim) Delehanty and Isbell.  Note that the Delehanty truly is a borderline 40.  When my grades were first "available", I put all of the cards in a new set registry and this was initially a 40; when it shipped it was changed to a 30.
